rooms.description: Large entrance hall with ample storage and display area.
Spacious modern living room with high ceilings and built-in seating. Vastu recommends placement of the main door in a positive direction.
Modern dining area with elegant lighting and minimalistic design. Vastu encourages balanced space distribution.
High-end modern kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances and a pantry. Vastu suggests that the main door of the kitchen should open towards East for positive energy.
Dedicated home office with integrated storage and ergonomic design. Positioned in the North-East as per Vastu for professional success.
Bathroom and laundry area combined to save space. Designed with modern fixtures and proper ventilation.

openings.description: Main entrance door designed for security and aesthetic appeal. Vastu recommends the front door to face the North or East direction.
Balcony window over the living area for natural light and ventilation. Vastu suggests opening windows in the South-West.

rooms.description: Master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet. Vastu aligns the bed in the South-West corner.
Additional bedroom with ample storage and a private balcony. Vastu suggests a North-East alignment for prosperity.
En-suite bathroom attached to the master bedroom with modern fixtures and adequate ventilation.

openings.description: Window for natural light in bedroom areas. Vastu encourages windows that open towards the East.

rooms.description: Extra living space that can be used as a guest room or additional study area. Vastu recommends placement in the North-West.

openings.description: Roof window to enhance natural lighting and ventilation. Vastu suggests roof openings in the North-East.
